text: The Alexander Dash is a body of a midibus. It has a step-entrance. It was built by Walter Alexander Coachbuilders from 1991 to 1997. It could be built on the Dennis Dart chassis or Volvo B6 chassis. It was built with either a horizontal or V-shaped windscreen. ==Related pages== * List of buses == References == ==Other websites== * Dash Category:Midibuses
title: Alexander Dash
